ComicInfo.Summary:
The only thing greater than Barry Windsor-Smith: STORYTELLER #1 is Barry Windsor-Smith: STORYTELLER #2! The second issue of this forward-thinking, ground-breaking series continues the adventures begun last issue. In The Paradoxman, Tristan Caine finds shelter from a terrible future in a dilapidated subway station inhabited by the survivors of a devastating nuclear war. In Young Gods, Heros spends the night before his wedding -- a wedding which will unite some of the most powerful gods of the cosmos -- drinking and brooding. And we all know where that can lead! And finally, in The Freebooters, Aran Ana-Kashan finds the man he has been looking for, the great warrior Axus. But finding Axus was only the first step in Aran's quest -- now he must convince the warrior that he is the only being who can save the world. If you're ready for something new -- if you're ready for the first comic of the next millennium -- you're ready for Barry Windsor-Smith: STORYTELLER! Windsor-Smith reinvigorated comics in the 1970s, and he's doing it again in this omnibus of wonder!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/barry-windsor-smith-storyteller-2/4000-42944/
ComicInfo.Title: The Paradoxman: Chapter Two; Young Gods: Chapter Two; The Freebooters: Chapter Two
